moves.name: Aqua Jet
moves.effect: This move has Priority.

moves.name: Aqua Ring
moves.effect: The user recovers 1d6 HP at the end of each of its turns.

moves.name: Aqua Tail
moves.effect: No additional effects.

moves.name: Brine
moves.effect: If the target is at half HP or less, this move's damage becomes Special + 8.

moves.name: Bubble
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Dexterity is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Dexterity is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Clamp
moves.effect: The target is trapped and takes damage for 1d4+1 rounds.

moves.name: Crabhammer
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Dive
moves.effect: The user dives underwater for one turn, becoming untargetable. It attacks on the second turn.

moves.name: Hydro Cannon
moves.effect: The user cannot act on the next turn.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.effect: This move has a high chance of missing.

moves.name: Liquidation
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Vitality is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Mist
moves.effect: The user and its allies are protected from stat-lowering effects for 5 rounds.

moves.name: Muddy Water
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's accuracy is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Octazooka
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's accuracy is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Protect
moves.effect: The user is immune to all damage and effects until its next turn. Chance to fail if used consecutively.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.effect: Changes the weather to Rain Weather for 5 rounds.

moves.name: Razor Shell
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Vitality is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Scald
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Burned.

moves.name: Soak
moves.effect: Changes the target's Type to pure Water for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Surf
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. Can be used to travel across water.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.effect: No additional effects.

moves.name: Water Pledge
moves.effect: If used after Fire Pledge, creates a rainbow. If used before Grass Pledge, creates a swamp.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Confused.

moves.name: Water Sport
moves.effect: Reduces the damage of all Fire-type moves by half for 5 rounds.

moves.name: Water Spout
moves.effect: Damage is reduced proportionally to the user's remaining HP.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Whirlpool
moves.effect: The target is trapped and takes damage for 1d4+1 rounds.

moves.name: Withdraw
moves.effect: The user raises its Vitality by 1 for the rest of the scene.
